# Configure email notification recipients list

Learn how to configure multiple email recipients for deployment notifications in Deployment Manager.

In Deployment Manager, you can configure the email list for notification regarding the deployment status. Previously, an email notification regarding the deployment status was sent to the tenantâ€™s logged-in user once the deployment was complete. For the user, it gives a consolidated view of the deployment status.

Now, you can add more than one email address, and everyone on the list will receive the email notification. By default, the deployment logs are attached to notifications, making it easier for you to understand the status of deployments.

1.  On the Deployment Setup screen, select Email Notifications Settings.
2.  Select Add ![Add](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/c82abb76-d85a-4661-b266-29f66bc84b07?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..M7wrdyDucoUhmoS_oj-MEnLHryjK1N6h9xXt_14FHew).
3.  Enter the recipient's Name and Email Address. Then select the ![Save](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/6b38dd00-9273-49c7-b138-195b9cc11262?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..NsABO44maGC4nrCxvM4y4KLEGopj2IO1VkvuuW27j9o) button.
4.  (Optional) Select![Edit](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/75470244-9bbc-48b6-9781-2aa7116f9e42?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..eaiwW2-2X-y1kp7PIcu6FMyJbodOJAh1gAhrtGKtNoY) to edit the recipient's email address and name.
5.  (Optional) Select![Delete email recipients](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/50dd6b6e-772d-4b52-b5ec-60197aa52933?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..YTRRdf9f36DLwAECoFB4Dy8OX9_vYwlMKn09XMzaeg8) to delete the recipient.
6.  Select Save .
